link.title: Account Link Request
link.request: The application '{appName}' from '{origin}' is requesting access to a {chain} account.
link.request_fresh: The application has already linked a {chain} account before as marked in the list below.
link.request_tooltip: The application will receive your account details (name and id) and link to Beet.

relink.title: Account ReLink Request
relink.request: The application '{appName}' from '{origin}' is requesting to relink the previously linked {chain} account: {accountId}. This is usually due to having deleted your browser's cache. On rare ocassions, this may be a phishing attempt so please double check the site you are visiting.
relink.request_tooltip: The previous link between the appplication and the account referencec will be reset.

account_id.title: Account Details Request
account_id.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}' is requesting access to the linked identity (account ID & account name) of account: {chain}: {accountName} ({accountId}).
account_id.request_tooltip: By default Beet provides an anonymous link. Certain apps/websites require access to your account id/name (e.g. for sign-in purposes). If this is the case, it is safe to 'Allow' here.

any_account_id.title: Account Details Request
any_account_id.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}' is requesting access to an account.

transfer.title: Transfer Request
transfer.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}' wants to initiate a transfer from { chain }:{ accountName }.
transfer.request_cta: Do you want to execute it?
transfer.server_error: The list of known scammers could not be loaded for checking, proceed with caution.
transfer.detected_scammer: The recipient is a known scammer, advice to abort.

rawsig.title: Request
rawsig.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}' has submitted the following transaction for account { chain }:{ accountName }.
rawsig.request_cta: Do you want to execute it?

whitelist.prompt: Whitelist subsequent '{method}' requests from this app?

vote.title: Vote Request
vote.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}'  wants you to vote for the following {entity} with account { chain }:{ accountName }

message.title: Sign Message Request
message.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}' wants you to sign the following text with account { chain }:{ accountName }

transfer.tooltip: Send assets from one account to another

limit_order_create.tooltip: An offer to sell an amount of an asset at a specified exchange rate by a certain time

asset_update_feed_producers.tooltip: Update the list of approved feed producers for created bitasset

asset_issue.tooltip: Issue your created assets to individuals

asset_fund_fee_pool.tooltip: Fund the fee pool for your created asset

asset_settle.tooltip: Settle an asset in your portfolio

asset_global_settle.tooltip: Globally settle one of your created bitassets

asset_publish_feed.tooltip: Publish a price feed for a bitasset

committee_member_update.tooltip: Update your committee member account details

committee_member_update_global_parameter.tooltip: Publish your committee member stance on Bitshares blockchain global parameter values

transfer_to_blind.tooltip: Transfer assets to a blind destination

blind_transfer.tooltip: Transfer blind assets in a blind manner

transfer_from_blind.tooltip: Withdraw assets from a blind balance

asset_claim_fees.tooltip: Claim the fees from an asset

bid_collateral.tooltip: Bid on a bitassets backing collateral when globally settled

asset_claim_pool.tooltip: Transfers BTS from the fee pool of a specified asset back to the issuer's balance

asset_update_issuer.tooltip: Update issuer of an asset. An issuer has general administrative power of an asset and in some cases also its shares issued to individuals. Thus, changing the issuer today requires the use of a separate operation that needs to be signed by the owner authority.

htlc_redeem.tooltip: Redeem the contents of a HTLC operation

htlc_extend.tooltip: Extend the duration of an HTLC operation

liquidity_pool_deposit.tooltip: Deposit funds into a liquidity pool

liquidity_pool_withdraw.tooltip: Withdraw funds from a liquidity pool

samet_fund_create.tooltip: Create a new SameT Fund. A SameT Fund is a fund which can be used by a borrower and have to be repaid in the same transaction.

samt_fund_repay.tooltip: Repay debt to a SameT fund.

credit_offer_create.tooltip: Create a new credit offer. A credit offer is a fund that can be used by other accounts who provide certain collateral.

credit_offer_accept.tooltip: Accept a credit offer and create a credit deal.
